basic.description: In this course, authors and movements such as the following are considered: Paul Claudel, Paul Valery, Andre Gide, Marcel Proust, Alain-Fournier, Surrealism, "Unanimisme," Francois Mauriac, Jean Giono, George Bernanos, Jean Giraudoux, Roger Martin du Gard, Antoine de Saint-Exupery, Guillaume Apollinaire, etc. Works studied include novels, plays and poetry. May be repeated to a maximum of six semester hours.
basic.subject: FRW
basic.title: Studies in 20th-Century Pre-War French Literature
